name: Queen Screen SPF 50+ Luminising Serum Skinscreen
about: What it is:A glow-giving SPF 50+ serum that protects and melts into the skin while fighting the look of fine linesu2014the perfect prep step before makeup..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, and Combination.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness.Formulation:Lightweight Serum.Highlighted Ingredients:- Bemotrizinol and Bisoctrizole: SPF filters with no eye sting and more efficient protection..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens and sulfates SLS & SLES. It is also vegan and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Queen Screen creates the perfect radiant base for your makeup, without pilling or balling. With a soft scent of rose, everyday SPF application has had a glow-up. Ultra Violetteu2019s Skinscreens are skincare plus sunscreen. Their product range is made and tested under the harshest conditions in the world, the Australian sun.
ingredients: -Bemotrizinol and Bisoctrizole: SPF filters with no eye sting and more efficient protection. .-Kakadu Plum: Rich in vitamin C and antioxidants that visibly boost brightness and hydration. .-IBR-SolAge (Pink Algae Extract): Rich in antioxidants that visibly brighten, firm, and smooth uneven skin tone. ..Homosalate 7%, Octisalate 5%, Bemotrizinol 4%, Ensulizole 3%, Bisoctrizole 2%, Water/Aqua/Eau, Isostearyl Neopentanoate, Cyclopentasiloxane, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Cyclohexasiloxane, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Glycerin, Cetyl Dimethicone, Lauryl PEG/PPG-18/18 Methicone, Acrylates/C12-22 Alkyl Methacrylate, Sodium Chloride, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Saccharide Isomerate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed, Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Propylene Carbonate, D-Panthenol, Mica, Decyl Glucoside, Arginine, Fragrance/Parfum, Hydroxyacetophenone, Coco-Glucoside, Titanium Dioxide, Benzyl Alcohol, Ethyl Linoleate, Disodium Lauryl Sulfosuccinate, Dunaliella Salina Extract, Terminalia Ferdinandiana Fruit Extract, Propylene Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Citric Acid, Pantolactone, Sodium Citrate, Tin Dioxide.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply daily and generously as the final step in your skincare routine, after moisturizer and before makeup.
